price: 33. Waxaa u muuqan (gaalada) xume waxay faleen (ciqaabteedii), waxaana koobi waxay ku jees-jeesi jireen (oo cadaab ah).
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wabadā lahum sayyiātu mā ʿamilū waḥāqa bihim mā kānū bihi yastahziūna
